# boundingBoxBuffers

**Instance Property**

A array of motion keyframes, each containing bounding box data.

## Declaration

```swift
var boundingBoxBuffers: [MTLMotionKeyframeData] { get set }
```

## Specifying bounding boxes data

- **boundingBoxStride**: The stride, in bytes, between bounding boxes in each buffer.

items.description: The stride, in bytes, between bounding boxes in each buffer.
